Handles various animations for the game, such as card interactions, hover effects, and transitions.

B

buttonAnimation(ImageView) - Method in class app.animation.AnimationGame
Applies a hover animation effect to a button, scaling it down slightly when hovered and restoring its original size when the mouse exits.

C

cardAnimation(ImageView, AnchorPane, List<ImageView>) - Method in class app.animation.AnimationGame
Applies animations to a card, including hover and drag effects.

D

deckHoverAnimation(ImageView) - Method in class app.animation.AnimationGame
Applies a hover animation effect to the deck, slightly scaling it down when hovered and restoring its original size when the mouse exits.
